Title: A more intuitive proof of a sharp version of HalÁsz’s theorem
Abstract: ©2018 Amerian Mathematial Soiety.We prove a sharp version of Halász’s theorem on sums ∑n≤x f(n) of multiplicative functions f with |f(n)| ≤ 1. Our proof avoids the “average of averages” and “integration over α” manoeuvres that are present in many of the∑ existing arguments. Instead, motivated by the circle method, we expressn≤x f(n) as a triple Dirichlet convolution and apply Perron’s formula.
